评论详情: This is a nice set of sunglasses; the colors/prints are great & very "on trend" & the price is very fair ($25.99/3 pack, $8.66/pair). The frames are pretty well structured, they have decent weight & don't feel flimsy. I've tried to be very careful with them, using cases etc. but they have incurred a few mild scratches. I'm not even sure how it happened so I do wish they were slightly more resistant to that. They do reduce glare well with their polarized lenses. My eyes are very sensitive to light though & I find these allow more light in than I'd prefer on very bright days. I think the size is well suited to smaller faces. In fact, I have them pictured on my 8 year old in my photos & they're really a great fit for her. When I put them on they're fine for a while but they will start to feel a bit tight after so long.

评论概述: A lot of bang for the buck for affordable sunglasses. Very pretty too!
类型: Color: A4 Transparent Brown+brown Gradient+transparent Grey
评论详情: I'm loving my set of Dushine Women's Classic Sunglasses. They fit great, look great on, are lightweight, and I love being able to choose the color according to what I'm wearing or doing that day. All the while they are protecting my eyes from UV rays and glare while giving me noticeable visual clarity.  I appreciate the lenses are made from TAC (tri-acetate cellulose, not 'tactical'). TAC is known for offering polarization, clarity, scratch resistance, reducing glare, and is lightweight. Every one of these features I noticed when I put on Dushine's sunglasses. This is not just plain plastic.  The first thing I that got my attention when I put on Dushine's sunglasses is the instant clarity. Wow! It's noticeable and appreciated. I can also tell the lenses are polarized, not just by the small test card they give, but how there is a sheer prismatic rainbow effect that happens on certain surfaces, most noticeably cars. (I also love some of the iridescent color shifts it gives to some cars when they drive by. It's a very cool effect.)  Despite my effort to be gentle with my new set of sunglasses, I've managed to drop each one the first day I wore them and on subsequent days. A couple of my sunglasses fell down right on the concrete! Ugh! And yet, surprisingly, they have not yet scratched. Whew! Here's to hoping it's TAC's scratch resistance doing its job.  These sunglasses have been a joy to use anytime I am outdoors. They're attractive, comfortable, and very useful for driving. I keep my sunglasses in color-coordinating sheaths by my door. I love them and would gladly buy this set again or another trio to further expand my color choices.

评论概述: Fabulous Three-Pack of Women's Sunglasses - A Versatile and Stylish Bargain!
类型: Color: A2 Transparent Brown+brown Gradient+grey Gradient
评论详情: I recently purchased a three-pack of women's sunglasses, and I couldn't be happier with this amazing deal! This pack includes three fabulous pairs of sunglasses that have become my go-to accessories for different occasions and outfits. Here's why I'm absolutely in love with them:  First and foremost, the variety of styles in this three-pack is fantastic. Each pair offers a distinct design, catering to different moods and fashion preferences. Whether I'm going for a classic and timeless look, a glamorous touch, or a sporty vibe, these sunglasses have me covered. I love having the option to switch up my style effortlessly without breaking the bank.  Not only do they offer a range of styles, but the quality of these sunglasses is also impressive. The frames are sturdy and well-constructed, ensuring they can withstand everyday wear and tear. The lenses provide excellent UV protection, which is a must for keeping my eyes safe from harmful rays. I have confidence in their durability, making them a long-lasting addition to my accessories collection.  Comfort is a crucial factor when it comes to sunglasses, and I'm pleased to say that these do not disappoint. Each pair fits comfortably on my face, with no tightness or discomfort around the temples or nose bridge. The lightweight design makes them easy to wear for extended periods without leaving any marks or discomfort on my skin. I truly appreciate that I can enjoy both style and comfort simultaneously.  One of the best aspects of this three-pack is the incredible value for money. The price for three high-quality pairs of sunglasses is unbeatable, especially considering their stylish designs and functional features. It's like getting three fashionable accessories for the price of one! This pack offers excellent versatility and allows me to mix and match the sunglasses with various outfits and activities.  Another advantage of having multiple pairs of sunglasses is the convenience of always having a backup. I can keep one in my car, one in my handbag, and one at home, ensuring I'm always prepared for any sunny situation. It's a practical investment that brings both fashion and functionality into my daily life.  In conclusion, I cannot sing enough praises for this three-pack of women's sunglasses. It's an incredible deal that offers style, quality, and versatility in one package. With their chic designs, durable build, and unbeatable value, these sunglasses are a must-have for any fashion-conscious woman. I highly recommend this three-pack to anyone looking to elevate their style while keeping their eyes protected in style. It's a definite win-win!
